results.title: Simvastatin is Efficacious in Treating Cirrhosis: A Meta-analysis.
results.text_hl: Four studies revealed the impact of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ mortality, with the overall @<m>DISEASE_Death</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003643 @@@death@@@ rate found to be significantly lower in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ relative to the control group [risk ratio (RR): 0.46; 95% confidence interval (CI), 0.29 to 0.73; P <0.01].

citations.NLM: Zhang H, Zhang Q, Li S, Xie B. Simvastatin is Efficacious in Treating Cirrhosis: A Meta-analysis. J Clin Gastroenterol. 2022 Sep 1;56(8):e303-e312. PMID: 35830548

results.title: Long-term outcomes of statin dose, class, and use intensity on primary prevention of cardiovascular mortality: a national T2DM cohort study.
results.text_hl: The priority of protective effects on @<m>DISEASE_Death</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003643 @@@mortality@@@ are @CHEMICAL_pitavastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C108475 @@@pitavastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Fluvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077340 @@@fluvastatin@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Lovastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008148 @@@lovastatin@@@ for the statin users compared with non-statin users.

citations.NLM: Yu JM, Chen WM, Shia BC, Wu SY. Long-term outcomes of statin dose, class, and use intensity on primary prevention of cardiovascular mortality: a national T2DM cohort study. Eur J Clin Pharmacol. 2023 May;79(5):687-700. PMID: 37010535

results.title: Simvastatin addition to standard of care improves long-term survival in patients with cirrhosis after variceal bleed: An open label randomized controlled trial.
results.text_hl: Twenty-four @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@(18%) on @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and 44(31%) on standard therapy @<m>DISEASE_Death</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003643 @@@died@@@ over follow-up[hazard-ratio(HR) for @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@: 0.48[95%CI:0.29-0.81;p=0.006) with similar results on intention to treat and on per-protocol analysis(excluding 17 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ who stopped @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@).

citations.NLM: Rana R, Tabish M, Agarwal S, Bayye R, Ahmed S, Gunjan D, Sharma S, Saraya A. Simvastatin addition to standard of care improves long-term survival in patients with cirrhosis after variceal bleed: An open label randomized controlled trial. Am J Gastroenterol. 2025 Jul 31;():. PMID: 40736696

results.title: LDL-cholesterol lowering and clinical outcomes in hypercholesterolemic subjects with and without a familial hypercholesterolemia phenotype: Analysis from the secondary prevention 4S trial.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: 2267 and 2164 participants had LDL-C <4.9 and >= 4.9 mmol/L, respectively. @<m>DISEASE_Death</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003643 @@@Mortality@@@ endpoints and major coronary events (MCE) were significantly reduced with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ versus placebo in both groups over 5.4 years, but the latter derived greater absolute risk reductions (ARR) (4.1-4.3% for @<m>DISEASE_Death</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003643 @@@mortality@@@ endpoints, versus 2.5-2.8%).

citations.NLM: Vallejo-Vaz AJ, Packard CJ, Ference BA, Santos RD, Kastelein JJP, Stein EA, Catapano AL, Pedersen TR, Watts GF, Ray KK. LDL-cholesterol lowering and clinical outcomes in hypercholesterolemic subjects with and without a familial hypercholesterolemia phenotype: Analysis from the secondary prevention 4S trial. Atherosclerosis. 2021 Mar;320():1-9. PMID: 33497862

results.title: Statin use and mortality in patients with deep vein thrombosis. Data from the RIETE Registry.
results.text_hl: The 3-month risk of @<m>DISEASE_Death</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003643 @@@death@@@ in statin users was significantly lower than in non-users in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with upper-limb @DISEASE_Venous_Thrombosis @DISEASE_MESH:D020246 @@@DVT@@@ (aHR: 0.81; 95%CI: 0.72-0.91), distal lower-limb @DISEASE_Venous_Thrombosis @DISEASE_MESH:D020246 @@@DVT@@@ (aHR: 0.48; 95%CI: 0.32-0.72), or proximal lower-limb @DISEASE_Venous_Thrombosis @DISEASE_MESH:D020246 @@@DVT@@@ (aHR: 0.69; 95%CI: 0.50-0.95), and in those receiving @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (aHR: 0.73; 95%CI: 0.60-0.90), @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ (aHR: 0.70; 95%CI: 0.59-0.85), or @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@ (aHR: 0.47; 95%CI: 0.27-0.80).

citations.NLM: Siniscalchi C, Bikdeli B, Jiménez D, Suriñach JM, Demelo-Rodríguez P, Moustafa F, Gil-Díaz A, García-Ortega A, Bui HM, Monreal M, RIETE Investigators. results.title: Inhibition of Delayed Cerebral Ischemia by Magnesium Is Insufficient for Subarachnoid Hemorrhage Patients: A Network Meta-Analysis
results.text_hl: In the network meta-analysis, @CHEMICAL_Magnesium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008274 @@@magnesium@@@ plus @CHEMICAL_Nimodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009553 @@@nimodipine@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ even showed an effective trend in @<m>DISEASE_Death</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003643 @@@death@@@/persistent vegetative status improvement.
